titleStmt.title: The answer of both Houses of Parliament presented to His Majestie at York the ninth of May concerning Sir Iohn Hothams refusal to give His Maiestie entrance into his town of Hull : with His Majesties reply thereunto.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
